name: The Chronicles of Dragon Wing - Reborn
name_original: The Chronicles of Dragon Wing - Reborn
description:
• PVP SRPGThis unique PVP game makes you experience the charm of SRPG that you never meet before. With classic turn-basic mechanism, every move is worth consideration.
  • Game MapMaps are make up of hexagon terrains. Forest that let you dodge physic attack, Wind Rest Array that makes you move again, and Alchemy Array that can draw a card, all these different terrains are the key to succeed.
  • HeroThere are tons of combination with heroes. Each hero, each skill can have reaction with others. Are you ready? Pick your hero and join a wonderful battle.
  • EquipmentThere three types of equipment: weapon, armor and accessory. At the beginning, players can get equipment with useful functionality. And you can get even more when you promote your progress.
  • Magical CardMagical card is the most use card except skill. There are over 30 types of magical card. Although your good fortune may not a decisive factor, a magical card can sometimes change your situation.
  • MultiplayerThere are various modes in the game, Except the conventional 1V1 mode, we had prepared 3V3 mode. Call your friends and play together!
  • Story ModeWell-designed story mode levels, helps you learn the game better, and lead you to the myth of Dragon Wing continent.
